questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes?
If your regular brand were not available, what other brands would you consider buying?
Is your regular brand Regular/King Size or Menthol or Superslims?
Is your regular brand Filter or Non-filter?
Is your regular brand Lowest/Ultra/Extra Low Tar, Light/Mild, or Full Flavor?
Do you usually buy it by the Pack, Carton, or Both Ways?
How long have you smoked this brand?
What, if any, was your previous brand?
The next time you go to the store, if your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
options: Go to another store to buy my regular brand.
Buy another type or length of my regular brand.
questions.answer: Go to another store to buy my regular brand.

questions.question: Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
options: I use almost any cigarette coupon I get.
I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes even if they are not for my regular brand.
I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand.
I never use coupons to buy cigarettes.
questions.answer: I only use coupons if they are for my regular brand.

questions.question: How often do you use special in-store cigarette offers such as a free gift with purchase, a 2-for-1, or special prices?
options: I look for special offers for my regular brand.
I take advantage of special offers for brands other than my regular brand.
questions.answer: I look for special offers for my regular brand.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes you?
Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older?
Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?
Would you be interested in joining a smokers group to help protect your right to smoke?
